name: KlickTipp Outbound triggers WhatsApp message template
description:
Sends a WhatsApp message via approved template using data from KlickTipp. Triggers when a contact runs through a specific e-mail campaign or a specific outbound in KlickTipp is triggered. Include dynamic values like First name, Product or service name, Sender name in the message and a Custom URL ending for call-to-action button via the WhatsApp Template.

Ideal for personalized offers, reminders, or discount campaigns.
